title: Medium-chain dicarboxylic acids: chemistry, pharmacological properties, and applications in modern pharmaceutical and cosmetics industries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17008-17021

Zhengrui Liao, Yu-Kee Yeoh, Thaigarajan Parumasivam, Wee Yin Koh, Mohammad Alrosan, Muhammad H. Alu'datt, Thuan-Chew Tan
Diverse chemistry, pharmacological properties, and applications in the modern pharmaceutical and cosmetics industries were reported and discussed for 7 medium-chain dicarboxylic acids.
